Text: 3D Realistic Fireplace Screen Saver  Full Version 3.9.2.5 with working serial IARG

i downloaded it. installed it. but when i go to change my screen saver it isn't in the list. where do I drag the file or folder so I dont have to manually open the file every time I want to use it? i placed it in the program folder and still nothing. i tried to locate the screen saver folder but nothing shows up.
thanks worked great i appericate it
@ninja78 - Drag the ss3dfire.scr into your windows\system32 folder.
